name: Baltic Media Alliance Limited
headAddress: Floor 2, Queens House, 180 Tottenham Court Road
goal: Broadcaster of non-EU-language and EU-language TV channels on the territories of Latvia and Lithuania representing second largest TV media holding in the Baltics.

euInitiatives: AVMSD initiatives. Policies and activity of OSCE Media Freedom and Development.
